instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00840 20V 0Amp No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Hi,
i have this board, very clean no liquid spill, the board have 20V usb c but 0 amp.
I havent PPBUS_G3H no short, I remove F7000 
PPDCIN_G3H = 20V
R7020/21=1
SMC_RST_IN=0V
SMC_RESET_R_L=3,3V
PP3V3_G3H=3,3V
I try to change U7000 & Q7030/40 but same problem.
have you an idea please?
thanks
best regards

threads.title: 820-00840 20V 0Amp No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Do you get any voltage at C7050, when F7000 is removed?
Check w/ and w/o battery connected.

Check voltage and diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

threads.title: 820-00840 20V 0Amp No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Hi 2informaticos,
no I haven't any voltage on C7050 when F7000 is removed without battery
but I have 10,99V with battery connected.

I remove battery to check SDA/SCL
SCL = 0,419V in diode mode = 0,300V in voltage mode
SDA = 0,103V in diode mode = 0,200 in voltage mode

threads.title: 820-00840 20V 0Amp No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
You have a problem with SDA line.
Remove D6950 and check again.

threads.title: 820-00840 20V 0Amp No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
ok i remove D6950 the SDA line come back to 0,419V in diode mode.
I change the diode, all is normal but when I charge the battery, the SDA line come back with the problem issue.
if I stay without D6950, the Mac work well.

edit:
the Mac stop to charge after 2min, the SDA line has a problem, maybe the SMC?

threads.title: 820-00840 20V 0Amp No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: Battery may be bad and SMC may get damaged, if D6950 is not in place.

threads.title: 820-00840 20V 0Amp No PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
ok the battery is good, I test with another good part. I change U7800 and U5000, now the board work well, I test few cycle of charge.
thanks
